remarks: If an atom is included in at-most an atom, they are equal.  More general version of ~ lsatcmp .  TODO: can ~ lspsncmp shorten this?  (Contributed by NM, 3-Feb-2015.)
statement:
lsatcmp2.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) $.
lsatcmp2.a $e |- A = ( LSAtoms ` W ) $.
lsatcmp2.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LVec ) $.
lsatcmp2.t $e |- ( ph -> T e. A ) $.
lsatcmp2.u $e |- ( ph -> ( U e. A \/ U = { .0. } ) ) $.
lsatcmp2 $p |- ( ph -> ( T C_ U <-> T = U ) ) $.
